column5: Griffy .. Besure to give all of us a fishing report from Birch Point Camp on Nungesser Lake. Don't forget C.P.R. on all fish except those you are going to feast upon. Take care have fun.Terry MitchellNewton, Iowa

When are you going to Birch Point? I'm going the first week of August. This is my first trip. Yours? What have you heard of the fishing? I heard walleye is very good early in the year but have heard nothing about late summer. Also heard an occasional large northern can be found. Good luck.
